description:
Build a SaaS E-commerce Platform Similar to Salla
Description:
I am seeking an experienced developer or team to create a SaaS-based e-commerce platform
inspired by Salla. The platform will enable users to build and manage their online stores efficiently,
with a subscription-based model for feature access. To optimize costs and reduce development
time, the developer is expected to utilize any popular open-source e-commerce platform (e.g.,
Magento, OpenCart, WooCommerce) as the foundation for this project.
Key Features:
1. Subscription Categories:
- Free Plan: Limited features (no integration with delivery companies or local credit cards).
- Standard Plan: Includes all features except accounting reports.
- Premium Plan: Includes all features, including accounting reports.
2. User Dashboard:
- Store creation and management.
- Customizable themes and layouts.
- Product and order management.
- Analytics and reporting.
3. Localization:
- Languages: Arabic (main) and English (secondary).
- Currency: Libyan Dinar (LYD) only.
- Hosting: Hosted locally with Libya Spider.
4. Payment & Delivery Integration:
- Payment gateway integration for local credit cards (except in the Free Plan).
- Integration with delivery companies (except in the Free Plan).
5. Additional Features:
- Mobile-responsive design.
- Secure data management.
- Multi-language support with a focus on Arabic and English.
Technology Stack:
I am open to suggestions, but the platform should be built with modern, scalable technologies.
Suggested options include:
- Backend: Node.js, Laravel, Django, or similar.
- Frontend: React, Vue.js, or Angular.
- Database: MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
- Hosting: Libya Spider.
Expectations:
- The developer will leverage a well-known open-source e-commerce platform to minimize costs and
development time.
- Clean, high-quality code for customizations and extensions.
- Scalable and secure architecture.
- Clear documentation and training for the final handover.
- Exclusive use of the Libyan Dinar (LYD) as the currency.
- Support for Arabic as the default language and English as a secondary option.
- Ongoing maintenance and support (optional).
How to Apply:
Please include the following in your proposal:
1. Relevant experience and portfolio.
2. Suggested open-source e-commerce platform and technology stack.
3. Questions or recommendations about the project.
Looking forward to working with talented developers to bring this vision to life!
title: Develop Subscription-Based E-commerce SaaS Platform

description:
- Project Description
Project Type:Web platform for connecting vehicle owners and mechanics.

- Project Summary:
A platform that aims to facilitate the connection between vehicle owners and qualified mechanics. The idea arose from a real need: not being able to find trustworthy mechanics quickly and easily. This platform seeks to solve this problem by offering a space where users can register their vehicles, search for specialized mechanics according to their needs and location, and schedule maintenance or repair services.

- Main Features:

1. User and Mechanic Registration:
- Vehicle owners will be able to register, create profiles, and associate their vehicles with their account.
- Mechanics will be able to register, create professional profiles, and specify their specialties (general mechanics, brakes, suspension, etc.), location, approximate rates, and ratings.

2. Smart Search:
- Users will be able to search for mechanics by specialty, location, availability, and ratings from other users.
- Advanced filters so they can find exactly what they need.

3. Vehicle Profiles:
- Users will be able to register their vehicles, indicating make, model, year, and other relevant details. This will help personalize recommendations.

4. Service Scheduling:
- Integration of a calendar system so that users can schedule appointments with mechanics.
- Automatic notifications to remind them of appointments.

5. Ratings and Testimonials System:
- Users will be able to rate and leave reviews about mechanics after each service, fostering trust and transparency in the platform.

- Project Objectives:
1. Build a functional, intuitive, and reliable platform that facilitates the connection between vehicle owners and mechanics.
2. Promote transparency in mechanics services through ratings and reviews.
3. Be the most practical and accessible tool to search for mechanics services.

- Technical Expectations:

1. Responsive design to be functional on mobile phones and tablets, since many users will access from their mobile devices.
2. SEO optimization to ensure good visibility in search engines.
3. Relational database system to manage users, mechanics, vehicles, and services efficiently.
title: Vehicle Owner & Mechanic Connection Platform

description:
I am looking for an experienced developer to create a trading bot for the Pocket Option platform. The bot should work on any currency pairs (e.g., AUD/CAD) and timeframes, using the API available in the Pocket Option console. It does not need to support OTC options – regular currency pairs will suffice. The bot should:

1. The bot will:

Connect to Pocket Option via the API.

Automatically execute trades based on market data.

Support only regular currency pairs (e.g., AUD/CAD), as Pocket Option does not support other assets.



2. Technical requirements:

It can be written in HTML and JavaScript or Python.

It may use AI/machine learning for market data analysis, but it is not required.

It should have access to real-time market data.



3. The main goal:

Achieve a win rate of above 98%. I understand this is very challenging, but I require the best approach.



4. Compensation:

The initial payment is 25$.

If the project meets the required performance (win rate above 98%), I will offer additional payment after the project is delivered, which will be 25$ or more.

description:
Development of Custom Frame Configurator for Shopify Integration

Introduction
We require the development of a custom frame configurator to be integrated into our Shopify store. The configurator should allow users to customize their frames in real-time, with dynamic previews reflecting the selected choices, and enable users to add their customized product to the cart for checkout.

What we will provide:

Pre-configured products: All frame products and variants will be pre-configured and ready to be incorporated into the configurator. Each frame will have various options like color, size, and material, which need to be configurable by the user.
Test Shopify store: We will provide a test Shopify store where the configurator can be developed and tested.
Product and configuration details: We will supply all necessary details for product cataloging and configuration, including descriptions, images, and pricing information for each variant.
Key Features and Requirements:

Dynamic Frame Preview:

The page should open with default preset choices (e.g., default image, default support, etc.).
A dynamic preview of the frame should be shown, which updates based on the user’s selections (image, dimensions, support, frame, passepartout, etc.).
Image Selection:

The user can upload their own image or choose from available images on the site.
If an image is uploaded, the system should automatically switch to "Free proportions" mode for the dimensions.
Dimension Selection (Numeric Input):

Users can input custom width and height values (in cm), with limits (minimum 10x15 cm, maximum 140x140 cm).
There should be quick selection buttons for standard formats (e.g., 3:2, 4:3, 16:9, A4), which will lock the dimensions according to the selected aspect ratio.
The default mode should be "Free proportions" unless an image is uploaded.
Support Selection:

The user can choose between the following support options:
Photo Paper (10€/m²)
Canvas (20€/m²)
No support (no print)
The price should be calculated based on the selected support material (price per square meter).
Outer Frame Selection:

The outer frame will have a thickness of 4 cm and a price of 10€/m.
The user can choose a color from a pill selector, filtering all available frame models in the chosen color.
The price will be calculated based on the perimeter (length) of the selected frame.
First Passepartout Selection:

A numeric input for the dimensions of the first passepartout (minimum 2.5 cm, maximum 15 cm) for each side.
The user can also choose the color of the passepartout via a pill selector.
The price will be calculated based on the area of the passepartout (price per square meter).
Second Passepartout Selection:

This will function similarly to the first passepartout but will be optional and applied only if the first passepartout is selected.
The price will be calculated based on the area of the second passepartout.
Second Frame Selection (External to the Second Passepartout):

Available only if the first frame is chosen with the required features to allow a second frame.
This frame will have a thickness of 2 cm and a price of 5€/m.
The user can select the color from a pill selector, which filters the models by color.
The price will be calculated based on the perimeter of the second frame.
Front Part Selection:

Available options:
Glass (15€/m²)
Plexiglass (18€/m²)
Mirror (20€/m²)
None (0€)
The price will be calculated based on the area of the front part, which depends on the frame dimensions (including the artwork, passepartout, etc.).
Back Part Selection:

Available options:
Cardboard (15€/m²)
MDF (18€/m²)
Florentine Paper (20€/m²)
The price will be calculated based on the area of the outer frame.
For frames smaller than 20x30 cm, there will be options for back parts suitable for placing the frame on a surface.
Hanging Hooks Selection:

The user can choose between three fixed hook options.
Each hook option will have a fixed price.
Summary Box:

A summary box should display all the selected options, showing a breakdown of the customized frame and the associated prices.
Dynamic Price Calculation:

The price should be dynamically updated based on the user’s selections (support, frame, passepartout, hooks, etc.).
The pricing formula should include: Support + Outer Frame + First Passepartout + Second Passepartout + Second Frame + Front Part + Back Part + Hanging Hooks.
Image Generation:

The final product preview image (including all selected components) should be generated dynamically.
The uploaded image should be cropped and adjusted according to the selected dimensions.
A schematic with the product dimensions (including measurements) should also be generated dynamically.
Responsive Design:

The configurator should be fully responsive, adapting to various devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).
Backend Management:

A backend system should be provided for easy management of the configurator (products, prices, variants, etc.).
The backend should allow easy updates for options, pricing, and images.
The system should also track orders for customized products.
Shopify Integration:

The configurator should seamlessly integrate with Shopify for both order processing and product inventory management.
Once the user finalizes their customization, they should be able to add the custom product to the cart and proceed to checkout through Shopify.
Development Timeline:

We estimate that the project will take approximately [X weeks] for development, testing, and integration with the Shopify store.
Weekly meetings are requested to track progress and address any issues.
title: Shopify Custom Framing Configurator Tool

description:
R Code Authentication System for Schools
The QR Code Authentication System is a professional, secure, and efficient solution designed for educational institutions to enhance security and streamline operations. This software provides a seamless way to track attendance and verify the identities of students and parents using QR codes. Developed with scalability and reliability in mind, it includes intuitive interfaces, robust functionality, and professional branding to meet the needs of modern schools.

Key Features
1. QR Code Generation
The system generates unique QR codes for parents and students:

Parents retain a single QR code, even if they have multiple children.
Each student has a unique QR code linked to their parent.
QR codes are organized into folders named after the student(s), ensuring easy access and management.
All generated QR codes are saved in a directory (C:\Users\Umar\Desktop\security\qr codes).
Includes a footer displaying: "Made by Nexgen Solutions."
2. QR Code Scanning and Authentication
The scanning module ensures smooth and accurate verification:

Single Scan Mode: Scans one parent QR code and one student QR code, notifying if the student is safe to go.
Multiple Child Mode:
Allows continuous scanning for parents with multiple children.
Ends scanning upon pressing "Enter" and matches scanned QR codes for authentication.
Displays clear notifications indicating which students are safe or not.
Automatically records attendance in an Excel file, stored in the directory (C:\Users\Umar\Desktop\qr_authentication_system\record), with real-time logs including date, time, and seconds.
3. Professional User Interface
A polished and user-friendly interface featuring:
Clear options like "Generate QR Code," "Scan QR Code," and "Multiple Child Mode."
Smooth animations and transitions for a modern experience.
Prominent branding with the Nexgen Solutions logo.
4. Reporting and Logs
Daily attendance records are stored in organized Excel sheets.
Enables administrators to review attendance and security logs with time-stamped entries.
5. Reliability and Scalability
Designed to handle large-scale operations, ensuring it supports schools of all sizes.
Built with a focus on security, efficiency, and ease of use.
This software is tailored to create a safer and more efficient school environment, providing peace of mind for parents, teachers, and administrators alike.
title: QR Code School Authentication System

description:
We are seeking an experienced Odoo specialist to configure our payroll and time clock system to ensure full compliance with Mauritius Workers Legislation. The project involves setting up and customizing Odoo's payroll functionalities to manage our workforce effectively and in accordance with local labor laws.

Scope of Work:

Odoo Payroll Configuration:

Install and set up the Odoo Payroll module.
Customize salary structures and rules to align with Mauritius labor laws, including:
Minimum wage requirements.
Overtime, weekend, and public holiday pay rates.
Leave entitlements and deductions.
Ensure accurate tax computations and statutory deductions as per Mauritius regulations.
Time Clock Integration:

Implement and configure Odoo's Attendance module for precise tracking of employee working hours.
Define working schedules, shifts, and break periods in line with company policies and legal requirements.
Integrate attendance data with the payroll system to automate salary calculations based on actual work entries.
Employee Data Management:

Input and manage details for 50 employees, including personal information, job roles, and compensation details.
Set up individual contracts and assign appropriate salary structures and working schedules.
Payslip Design and Automation:

Design payslip templates that comply with Mauritius labor laws, ensuring all necessary details are included, such as:
Gross salary.
Deductions (taxes, pension contributions, etc.).
Net salary.
Overtime, bonuses, and other allowances.
Configure the system to generate payslips automatically at the end of each pay period.
System Testing and Training:

Conduct thorough testing to ensure the system's accuracy and reliability.
Provide training sessions for HR and payroll staff on using the new system effectively.
Offer documentation and user manuals for future reference.
Deliverables:

A fully configured and operational Odoo payroll and attendance system tailored to Mauritius labor laws.
Comprehensive employee database with accurate contract details.
Customized payslip templates that meet legal standards.
Training materials and sessions for relevant staff members.
Ongoing support for a specified period to address any issues or adjustments needed.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in configuring and customizing Odoo, particularly the Payroll and Attendance modules.
Strong understanding of Mauritius labor laws and payroll requirements.
Ability to customize Odoo modules to meet specific legal and organizational needs.
Excellent communication skills for effective collaboration and training delivery.
Additional Information:

kindly quote this code: ODOO877 (When submitting your quote - Quote without this code will be rejected/deleted)

Please include examples of similar projects you've completed, particularly those involving Odoo and compliance with local labor laws.
Provide an estimated timeline and cost for the project.
Specify any additional resources or information you will require to complete this project successfully.
We are looking for a professional who can deliver a reliable and compliant solution within a reasonable timeframe. If you have the required expertise, we look forward to your proposal!
title: Odoo Payroll & Timeclock Configuration Specialist

description:
Design Brief: HTML Email for Crown Booths
Project Overview
Crown Booths aims to increase its corporate client portfolio by targeting past clients who booked our services for weddings, engagements, and birthdays. The goal is to offer these clients an exclusive promotion of 20% off any package for their place of employment. The email should be fun, engaging, and visually appealing while maintaining a professional tone suitable for corporate promotions.
________________________________________
Objective
•	Convert past clients into corporate bookings by promoting a 20% discount.
•	Highlight versatility: Team building days, galas, and end-of-year parties.
•	Create a memorable impression that encourages recipients to act immediately.
________________________________________
Key Deliverables
1.	HTML Email Design
o	Mobile-responsive and visually optimised for various email clients.
o	A clear, fun, and professional layout.
2.	Content Structure
o	Header: Crown Booths logo with an eye-catching headline like "Just for Your Workplace!"
o	Opening: Personalised greeting (Dear [First Name],).
o	Body:
	Express gratitude for their previous booking.
	Introduce the 20% discount for corporate events.
	Highlight event examples: Team building, galas, end-of-year parties.
	Reinforce the value of Crown Booths for creating memorable moments.
	Forward this email to where it needs to go or E-introduce us to your events team.
o	Call-to-Action (CTA):
	A bold, clickable button: "Get in touch", linking to a contact form or the packages page.
o	Footer:
	Contact information, social media links.
	Unsubscribe link.
________________________________________
Tone and Style
•	Tone: Fun yet professional.
•	Colour Palette: Reflective of the Crown Booths brand (provide colours or allow designer to reference branding).
•	Typography: Clean and readable, matching Crown Booths’ branding.
________________________________________
Target Audience
•	Past clients (weddings, engagements, birthdays).
•	Their places of employment (corporate clients).
________________________________________

description:
I'm looking to develop a "Happy Hour Mobile App" that will run on both Android and Apple phones. The core functionality of the app is to help users locate nearby businesses offering "happy hour specials on food, drinks or experiences."

Key Features For the App:
= Each happy hour location should have comprehensive information, including:
= business address, directions, reviews and ratings, menu and prices, and photos of the location, products and experiences.

- The app should also incorporate:
= "Call Location" Feature for clients who would like to call location
= Booking/Reservation ability if the location permits
= Share Button to share deals, locations, reviews and photos.
= Save/Favorite Location button
= An easy to use back end "offer section" for clients to add/edit happy hour deals on the app and computer back end. 
= An experience survey after the client visits the location, this can be detected via geofencing or receipt upload (as proof of purchase)

Additional Features Requested:
= An AI Chat Bot to answer basic user queries about each specific location. Hours, product availability, parking details, etc.
= Referral / affiliate code customers can share with their contacts to receive kick back promotion from participating locations.
= "Influencer" section/portfolio where our registered "influencers" can be "invited/incentivized" by participating businesses to redeem a special offer put on by the business to influence the purchase or customer to visit that location for the offer. This will help participating businesses create temporary controlled incentives/offers to promote our "influencer" clients to visit the business and redeem the offer advertised specially for customer profiles we tag as "influencer"

We would like to create this app as a "Digital Billboard" to help existing businesses showcase their happy hour offerings and hours offered. Mainly, providing this service without interfering or requesting preferred customization marketing material for our business, in an effort to keep everything simple. Based off feedback with early adopters, we are considering not accepting payments for customer transactions, we will make our revenue from charging businesses a fee to advertise their happy hour offerings on this new app. If you have another view point on this or worked on a similar project and have another recommendation, we want to hear from you.

We want to use this app to simply showcase existing happy hour offers at advertised times, at participating locations and keeping the relationship simple. Charging business a $x to advertise/showcase happy hour offers. 

Regular customers can register for free, however we require some form of verifying that only adults can use the application because we will be advertising adult businesses (vape, smoke lounges, night clubs, etc). 

We will be Charging influencers $x for access to the influencer section/customer tag to via temporary custom promos from businesses to influencers. Ex. business can send an influencer an offer for "5 people, includes table reservation and bottle of wine + chicken wings for $49.98" in an effort to bring those influencers to the business location to capture the deal outside the regular happy hour offerings advertised.

We are open to additional ideas/feedback you may have about improving this project, we are looking for a long time partner and this relationship would be ongoing for the developer or team to maintain and update the new application for us as improvements and suggestions are requested at future dates.

Ideal Skills and Experience:
- Extensive experience in mobile app development for both Android and iOS.
- Prior work on location-based services is a plus.
- Proficiency in integrating AI chatbots into mobile applications.
- Expertise in creating user-friendly interfaces for easy navigation and interaction.
- Experience in incorporating social sharing features within a mobile app.
- Developer or Team looking to have some fun as we grow this project

- We are accepting offers, nothing is turned down and every application will be considered.
title: Happy Hour Finder Mobile App

description:
Hi, we are a premier yacht detailing business based in South Florida, dedicated to providing top-notch services to yacht owners. Our goal is to enhance the efficiency of our business while also increasing profitability by harnessing the power of GoHighLevel


1. Set Up Appointment Types:
   - Create Service Categories: Within GHL, set up different appointment types for each tier of service (Basic, Standard, Premium). Each category will have its own description detailing what’s included in each package.
   - Define Duration and Availability: Assign specific durations and availability slots for each service type to help manage our calendar efficiently.

2. Implement a Maintenance Schedule:
   - Create a Suggested Maintenance Calendar: Develop a visual calendar or timeline highlighting recommended maintenance intervals for different vessel criterias. This will include when will they will need a detail which will vary in duration  between details depending on the type of protectant they choose and how the boat is stored.
   - Integrate with Simplybook.me: Link this maintenance schedule to the booking system, so clients can see when their next recommended service is due based on their previous appointments and the tier they are currently enrolled in.

3. Tiered Pricing Structure:
   - Detail Pricing Information: Clearly outline the benefits and features of each tier (Basic, Standard, Premium) in the appointment description. This helps clients make informed decisions on which package best suits their needs.
   - Use Visuals: Use images or infographics to showcase the differences between the tiers, enhancing understanding and appeal.

4. Client Self-Scheduling:
   - Enable Online Booking: Share booking link on our website and GMB, allowing clients to schedule their appointments directly from our website or google listing without needing to call.
   - Automated Confirmations and Reminders: Set up automated email or SMS confirmations and reminders for appointments to reduce no-shows and keep clients informed.

5. Follow-Up and Upselling:
   - Post-Appointment Follow-Ups: Use GHL’s automation features to send follow-up messages after appointments, thanking clients and suggesting future services based on their vessel’s maintenance needs.
   - Promote Upgrades: In follow-ups, highlight the benefits of upgrading their service tier or scheduling additional services.

6. Feedback Collection:
     Post-Service Surveys Automated Follow-Ups: Set up automated email and SMS follow-ups that trigger after a service is completed. Use GHL's automation feature to send these messages.
   - Survey Creation: Create a feedback survey using GHL’s survey tool or integrate Google Forms. Include questions about the service quality, customer satisfaction, and areas for improvement.

7. Categorize Feedback:
   -Organize feedback into categories (e.g., service quality, punctuality, organization, time management, communication etc.) to pinpoint specific areas that may need adjustments.

8. Reputation Management:
   -Automated Review Requests: After a first time wash service is completed or any detail service and feedback is collected, send an automated request for a review. Use GHL to send links to our Google My Business.

Responding to Reviews: Develop an automated strategy for responding to both positive and negative reviews. Thank clients for positive feedback and address concerns raised in negative reviews professionally.

9. Using Automation for Efficiency:
   - Automate Workflows: Create workflows in GHL that automate the entire feedback and review process, from sending follow-up messages to reminders for clients to leave reviews.
   - Custom Tags: Use tags in GHL to segment clients based on their feedback, allowing for targeted follow-ups and tailored communication.

10. Create Sales Funnels:
    - Nurture Leads: Implement automated email and SMS follow-ups to nurture leads driven by Google PPC and Meta Ads to keep our services top-of-mind.
   - Conversion: Utilize appointment scheduling features to make it easy for leads to book directly from email or text follow up.

11. Leverage CRM Features:
   - Segment our contacts based on their behavior and interactions (full time wash client but no details, detail client but not a full time wash client or both full time wash and detail client)This allows for targeted marketing and personalized communication.

12. Automate Marketing Campaigns:
   - Set up automation sequences for emails and SMS reminders to reduce no-shows and keep clients informed about their upcoming service or current detail status.

13. Quickbooks Online Integration:
    - Link current QB account with GHL for seamless accounting 

13. Training and Support:
   - Educate: Ensure that you give a walk through and explain how to use the GHL features you've set up effectively, so that I can assist clients when necessary.
   - Provide Support Resources: Create FAQs or support resources to help our clients navigate the self-scheduling system if they encounter any difficulties.
title: Expert for GoHighLevel Setup for Yacht Detailing Business

List shipping rates: Retrieve available rates and export them automatically to Google Sheets, including carrier details, costs, and estimated delivery times in dedicated cells.

Develop scripts to integrate Google Sheets with Sendcloud API.
Manage the application of markups to calculated shipping prices.
Document the process for future modifications.

Nice to Have:

Ability to integrate the system with additional tools like Zapier or Integromat if needed.

description:
Project Overview

We are seeking a skilled freelancer to develop a trading terminal that integrates with the Binance API and potentially other centralized exchanges (CEXs) to provide users with a robust platform for trading cryptocurrencies. The terminal should offer real-time data, order execution capabilities, portfolio management features, and a monetization strategy through fee structures.

Objectives

To create an intuitive and user-friendly trading 
terminal.

To ensure seamless integration with the Binance API and other CEXs for liquidity.

To implement security best practices to protect user data and transactions.

To establish a fee structure for monetizing the platform.

Key Features

1. User Interface (UI)
Dashboard: A comprehensive dashboard displaying real-time market data, including price charts, order books, and recent trades.

Order Management: Functionality for placing, modifying, and canceling buy/sell orders.
Portfolio Overview: A section for users to view their holdings, performance metrics, and transaction history.

2. API Integration

Market Data: Fetch real-time price feeds, order book data, and trade history from the Binance API and other selected CEXs. 

Trading Operations: Implement order placement (market, limit, stop-loss) through the APIs.
Account Management: Enable users to view their account balances and transaction history.

Spot and Future Trading Incorporated 

3. Security Features

Authentication: Implement secure user authentication methods (e.g., OAuth2, API key management).

Data Encryption: Ensure all sensitive data is encrypted during transmission and storage.
Two-Factor Authentication (2FA): Provide an option for users to enable 2FA for added security.

4. Monetization Features

Admin Panel.

Fee Structure Implementation: Develop a system to charge fees on trades executed through the platform. 

This can include:

Trading Fees: A percentage fee on each trade executed by users.

Withdrawal Fees: Fees charged when users withdraw funds from their accounts.

Subscription Model: Optional premium features available via a subscription fee.

Fee Transparency: Clearly display fee structures on the platform to ensure transparency for users.

5. Additional Features

Notifications: Real-time alerts for price changes, order executions, and significant market events.
Customizable Interface: Allow users to customize their dashboard layout and widgets according to their preferences.

Mobile Responsiveness: Ensure the terminal is accessible on various devices, including desktops and mobile devices.

Deliverables

Fully functional trading terminal with all specified features.

Comprehensive documentation detailing installation, usage, API integration, and fee structures.
Source code repository (e.g., GitHub) with version control.

Testing reports demonstrating functionality and security measures

Turnaround: 3 Weeks

Bidding: Only bid if you have developed this historically. Please ensure you provide a URL of the work you have previously developed in line with the scope. 

Full Source Code and Documentation To be Provided. 

Final Deployment on Client Server.
title: Cryptocurrency (CEX) Web Based Trading Terminal Development

Project Description:
 We aim to develop a platform that utilizes AI to automatically merge specific images (URL-based) with user-stored images on both smartphone and web environments. Users will input an image URL, load the image, and combine it with their saved image using AI. The final composite image will be displayed instantly and available for download. This project requires advanced AI image synthesis technology and expertise in stable web and app development.
Functionality:
Users input a specific image URL.
The platform loads the image and updates it dynamically if the URL changes.
The input image is combined with a user-stored image using AI.
The composite image is immediately displayed to the user and available for download.
Technical Requirements:
AI Frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV
Image Synthesis Models: DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, DeepFaceLab, or other open-source tools
Programming Languages: Python, JavaScript (React.js/Node.js/Next.js)
Server: Experience with AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure server configurations
Data Processing: Experience in image preprocessing and optimization
Frontend: UI/UX development using React.js or Vue.js
Backend: API development using Node.js, Django, or Flask
Mandatory Qualifications:
Proven experience in AI-based image synthesis and processing technologies (e.g., Stable Diffusion, GANs)
Minimum of 5 years of experience in web and app development
Expertise in designing and implementing RESTful APIs or GraphQL APIs
Experience in cloud server deployment and maintenance (AWS/GCP)
Proficiency in using Git and team collaboration tools (e.g., JIRA, Trello)
Required Submissions:
 Provide a portfolio of AI image synthesis solutions or websites you have developed.
title: AI Image Synthesis and Customization Platform Development

o	Maintain a container list with:
	Nicknames for containers.

	Temperature-controlled or normal.

o	Maintain records of organizations with:
	Shipment arrival date for each registration.
	Containers storing their goods.
	Quantity and value of stored goods.

Create Your Custom Gift Box:
Diverse Gift Options: Choose from a wide range of high-quality gift items, including gourmet treats, luxury goods, wellness products, tech gadgets, and more. We offer an extensive selection of products to suit every taste and preference.
  
Select Your Box: Pick from a variety of beautifully designed boxes, each tailored to complement different themes and occasions. Whether you want a classic, elegant look or something more playful and vibrant, we have a box to match your style.

Mix & Match: Add multiple gift items to your box or select a single product. You can curate a box that fits your specific needs, ensuring a personalized touch for each recipient.

Custom Branding: Add your company logo to the box or any of the products for a professional and branded touch. Whether you're gifting for a holiday, a milestone, or a special event, we make it easy to incorporate your brand identity.

 How It Works:
1. Pick Your Products: Browse through our curated selection of premium gifts or add individual products to your custom box.
2. Choose Your Box Design: Select from an array of box styles to give your gift that perfect finishing touch.
3. Add a Personal or Corporate Logo: Upload your logo directly to the box or individual items for a truly personalized experience.

description:
Project Description: Website Development for Alfa Specialised Hospital Ltd
Overview
Alfa Specialised Hospital Ltd in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, is seeking a skilled and experienced web developer or development team to create a premium website for our hospital. The website should include advanced features such as online payment integration, appointment booking, and detailed information about our branches.

Project Requirements
1. Website Design and Development
Responsive Design: The website must be fully responsive and compatible with all devices (desktops, tablets, and mobile phones).
User-Friendly Interface: The design should be intuitive and easy to navigate for all users, including patients and staff.
Modern Aesthetics: The website should have a clean, professional, and modern look that aligns with our hospital's branding.
2. Key Features
Online Payment Integration: Secure online payment gateway for patients to pay for services and consultations.
Appointment Booking System: A robust system for patients to book, reschedule, and cancel appointments online.
Detailed Branch Information: Comprehensive details about all hospital branches, including services offered, contact information, and location maps.
Patient Portal: Secure login area for patients to access their medical records, test results, and appointment history.
Blog/News Section: A section for publishing health-related articles, news, and updates from the hospital.
Contact Forms: Easy-to-use contact forms for inquiries and feedback.
SEO Optimization: The website should be optimized for search engines to improve visibility and ranking.
3. Technical Specifications
Content Management System (CMS): The website should be built on a user-friendly CMS (e.g., WordPress, Joomla) to allow easy updates and management by hospital staff.
Security: Implementation of robust security measures to protect patient data and prevent unauthorized access.
Performance: The website should be fast-loading and optimized for performance.
Compliance: Ensure the website complies with relevant healthcare regulations and standards.
4. Deliverables
Fully functional and tested website with all the specified features.
Documentation and training for hospital staff on how to use and manage the website.
Ongoing support and maintenance for a specified period after the website launch.
Proposal Submission
Interested freelancers or development teams are invited to submit their proposals, including:

Portfolio: Examples of previous work, especially healthcare-related websites.
Technical Approach: Detailed plan on how you will develop and implement the website.
Timeline: Estimated timeline for project completion.
Cost: Detailed cost breakdown for the project, including any ongoing maintenance fees.
References: Contact information for previous clients who can provide references
title: Alfa Hospital's Specialised Web Development

description:
Website Design for Secret Roast

Overview:
We are seeking a highly creative freelance graphic designer to create a stunning and interactive design for our coffee brand, Secret Roast. The goal is to craft a visually captivating website that embodies the premium and mysterious essence of our brand. This project focuses only on the graphic design and layout—no coding or development is required. The final deliverables should be ready for handoff to a web development team.

Scope of Work:
	1.	Homepage Design:
	•	A visually striking landing page that immediately engages visitors with a premium and mysterious aesthetic.
	•	Incorporate smooth animations, such as parallax scrolling, subtle hover effects, and transitions.
	•	Showcase key brand elements like coffee blends, origin stories, and sustainability efforts.
	•	Include space for a hero image or video.
	2.	Product Pages:
	•	Design individual pages for each coffee blend with a focus on storytelling and high-quality imagery.
	•	Add interactive features like animated product highlights or hover-to-view details.
	3.	About Us Page:
	•	Create a visually appealing page to tell the brand’s story and highlight the inspiration behind “Secret Roast.”
	•	Use creative layouts with text animations and engaging visuals to maintain user interest.
	4.	Contact Page:
	•	A clean, user-friendly page with an interactive contact form design and space for location or social media links.
	5.	E-Commerce Focus:
	•	Design a mockup for a streamlined shopping cart and checkout process.
	•	Include an interactive product grid with filters and hover effects.
	6.	Animations:
	•	Use dynamic elements like fading text, sliding images, and subtle micro-interactions to enhance the user experience.
	•	Create smooth transitions between sections and pages.

Deliverables:
	•	High-fidelity mockups for the homepage, product pages, brand story, gallery, about us, contact  pages.
	•	Interactive prototypes demonstrating animations and transitions (using tools like Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch).
	•	All assets, including layered design files and any necessary illustrations or icons.

Style and Aesthetic:
	•	Theme: Sophisticated, premium, and mysterious, reflecting the “secret” element of the brand.
	•	Color Palette: Deep browns, blacks, and gold tones, with accents of cream or white for contrast.
	•	Typography: Modern and elegant fonts that convey luxury and quality.
	•	Imagery: High-resolution visuals of coffee beans, cups, and lifestyle elements related to coffee culture.

Requirements:
	•	Proven experience in designing interactive and visually engaging websites.
	•	Strong portfolio showcasing similar projects, preferably for luxury or food & beverage brands.
	•	Expertise in tools like Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, or similar.
	•	Ability to provide guidance on best practices for interactivity and animations.

Budget and Timeline:
	•	Budget: To be discussed based on experience and portfolio.
	•	Timeline: 2–3 weeks for completion.


We look forward to collaborating with you to bring Secret Roast to life!
title: Modern Coffee Brand Graphic Design in Figma

description:
Objective

The goal is to create an elegant, intuitive, and responsive website for our property management company, specializing in short-term rentals of villas and apartments in Italy. The site should be built on WordPress or Drupal, featuring a modern and cutting-edge design optimized for mobile devices. It must include a Booking Engine provided by us and allow for easy maintenance and future customization.

1. General Specifications

Platform: WordPress or Drupal.

Design: Elegant and minimalist, inspired by the website https://www.luccaapartmentsandvillas.co.uk/.

Responsive Design: Compatible with desktop, tablet, and smartphone devices.

Maintainability: Intuitive management interface for quick updates by our team.

Customizability: Easily modifiable structure to allow for future interventions by external developers.

2. Site Features

2.1. Homepage

Header:

Company logo.

Main navigation menu (Properties, Categories, Services, Contacts, About Us).

Advanced search bar to find properties (with filters such as destination, type, price, availability, number of guests).

Hero Section:

High-resolution slideshow images with promotional messages.

Promotional Sections:

Presentation of property categories (e.g., Villas, Luxury Apartments, Rustic Homes).

Call-to-action for the Booking Engine.

2.2. Property Listing

Presentation:

Grid or list layout.

Thumbnails of main images for each property.

Summary information (name, location, price per night, number of guests).

"Details" button.

Filters and Sorting:

Advanced filters by destination, type, price, number of rooms, availability.

Sorting by price, popularity, reviews.

2.3. Property Detail Page

Content:

High-resolution image gallery.

Detailed description (formatted text, bullet points for key features).

Interactive map showing the property’s location.

List of amenities and features (Wi-Fi, pool, parking, etc.).

Availability calendar.

Booking button linked to the Booking Engine.

2.4. Categories

Display of all properties grouped by categories (e.g., Villas with Pools, Rustic Tuscan Homes, City Apartments).

2.5. Booking Engine Integration

Connection with our Booking Engine via widget.

Custom interface aligned with the site design.

Smooth and secure booking flow.

2.6. Static Pages

About Us: Information about the company, mission, and values.

Services: Details of services offered, including concierge and personalized management.

Contacts: Contact form, email/phone information, address with map.

FAQ: Frequently asked questions with clear and concise answers.

3. Technical Aspects

3.1. SEO and Performance

Search engine optimization (SEO).

Optimized loading speed with caching and image compression.

Clear and readable URL structure.

3.2. Security

HTTPS implementation.

Automatic backups.

Protection against common attacks (e.g., SQL injection, XSS).

3.3. Multilingual

Italian and English.

IMPORTANT NOTES: Pre-approval of the design with a mock up of at least the main design elements of the site is required
title: Elegant Property Management Website Development

description:
Hi everyone! I’m working on a project for the Medical Education Technology Center (MITC), focusing on analyzing simulation events scheduled from 01.08.2023 to 31.01.2025. We’re using the “SimPlan” calendar to manage events, but I need help organizing and processing the data to generate actionable insights.

Here’s what I’m looking to achieve:

Analyze event workload based on type (automated study sessions, independent skills training, and non-study events) for specific time periods.
Calculate instructor and venue utilization, including peak hours and percentage of usage.
Understand student participation across different events and semesters.
Compare growth in event frequency and duration between Fall 2023 and Fall 2024.
Identify trends like most/least attended skill groups and time spent on events with keywords (e.g., “excursion,” “first aid”).
If you have expertise in data analysis, Excel, or tools that can help process and visualize this type of information efficiently, I’d love to hear your suggestions or collaborate.
title: MedTech Center Data Analysis for 2023-2025

description:
Project Title:
Install Cookies Browser Before Loading Content for High CPC Ads

Project Overview:
We are looking for a skilled freelancer to implement a solution for managing cookies in the browser before loading high CPC (Cost Per Click) ad content on our website. The goal is to ensure that ads are properly tracked and served only to users who accept the necessary cookies, improving the user experience and optimizing ad revenue.

Key Responsibilities:
Cookie Consent Management:

Integrate a cookie consent management tool to prompt users to accept or decline cookies.
Ensure that cookies related to ad tracking are only set after user consent is given.
Loading High CPC Ads:

Develop a mechanism that prevents high CPC ads from loading until the user has accepted the cookie consent.
Use an ad network like Google AdSense, or another high CPC provider, to ensure that ads are shown only to consenting users.
Testing and Optimization:

Test the implementation across multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, etc.) to ensure compatibility.
Optimize the performance so that cookie consent and ad loading don’t affect the website's speed or user experience.
Compliance:

Ensure that the cookie consent mechanism and ad loading process comply with relevant regulations, such as GDPR and CCPA.
Documentation:

Provide clear documentation on how the cookie management and ad loading system works.
Include instructions for future updates or changes to the cookie management system.
Required Skills:
Web development experience (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
Familiarity with cookie consent management solutions (e.g., Cookiebot, OneTrust, etc.).
Experience with ad networks (Google AdSense, Media.net, etc.).
Knowledge of GDPR and CCPA compliance.
Strong debugging and optimization skills.
Deliverables:
Working cookie consent solution integrated with the website.
High CPC ads that load only after cookie consent is given.
Documentation on how the system works and how to make updates.
A report on testing and optimization, including browser compatibility.
Timeline:
Estimated project completion time: 2-3 weeks from the start date.
Budget:
Please provide an estimated cost for the project.
Additional Notes:
Communication via [platform tool/chat/email] will be preferred for updates.
You may also be required to implement future updates or fixes if needed.
How to Apply:
Please submit a proposal outlining your relevant experience, a brief plan for how you will implement the solution, and any previous examples of similar work.
title: Browser Cookie Manager for High CPC Ads

description:
**"Set Cookies from JSON File and Refresh Webpage Content Dynamically"**

---

### **Project Overview**  
The objective of this project is to create a script or program that loads a set of cookies from a JSON file, applies them to a specified website, and refreshes the webpage to reflect the updated cookies. This tool will allow users to simulate custom sessions or user states for testing, automation, or development purposes.

---

### **Project Requirements**  

1. **Load Cookies from JSON**  
   - The JSON file should contain an array of cookies with standard properties (e.g., `name`, `value`, `domain`, `path`, `expiry`, etc.).  
   - Validate the structure of the JSON file before processing.

2. **Set Cookies for the Target Website**  
   - Programmatically set cookies for the given website URL.  
   - Ensure cookies are stored and used by the browser for subsequent requests.

3. **Refresh Webpage Content**  
   - Reload the target website to apply the updated cookie state.  
   - Ensure the webpage reflects changes made by the new cookies (e.g., user authentication, preferences).

4. **Compatibility**  
   - Support common browsers (e.g., Chrome, Firefox).  
   - Include options to use a headless browser (e.g., Puppeteer, Selenium) for automation purposes.

5. **Customization Options**  
   - Allow users to specify the target website URL dynamically.  
   - Include error handling for cases like invalid JSON, unreachable URLs, or cookie setting failures.

6. **Documentation**  
   - Provide clear instructions on how to use the tool.  
   - Include an example JSON file and explain the required format.

---

### **Deliverables**  
1. A working script or program (e.g., Python, JavaScript) that implements the required functionality.  
2. A sample JSON file demonstrating the cookie format.  
3. Documentation with setup instructions, usage guide, and troubleshooting tips.  

---

### **Preferred Tools and Technologies**  
- **Programming Languages:** Python, JavaScript (Node.js)  
- **Libraries/Frameworks:**  
  - Python: Selenium, Requests  
  - JavaScript: Puppeteer, Playwright  
- **Browsers:** Chrome, Firefox  

---

### **Additional Notes**  
- The solution must comply with applicable privacy laws and not be used for malicious purposes.  
- The user must have permission to modify cookies for the target website.

---

Let me know if you'd like to refine this description further or add specific requirements!
title: JSON File Cookie Loader & Webpage Refresher

description:
Proposal and Proof of Work Requirements for Dynamic Excel Sheet Development

We are seeking an experienced Excel developer to create a dynamic, visually appealing, and proprietary tool for our loan officers. This tool will enable our team to present purchase and refinance scenarios to clients, offering detailed calculations, comparisons, and insights. It should reflect Cohen Mortgage branding, include precise mortgage insurance premium calculations for different loan programs, and be protected to maintain its proprietary nature.

Project Scope and Features:

1. User Data Entry Inputs:
- Property address
- Purchase price
- Down payment percentage
- Loan amount (calculated automatically)
- Interest rate (fixed or adjustable options)
- Loan term (e.g., 15, 20, 30 years)
- Loan Program (Conventional, FHA, VA, USDA, Jumbo)
- Annual property taxes
- Annual homeowner’s insurance premiums
- Annual homeowner's association dues; if applicable
- Mortgage insurance premiums (calculated based on loan program)

2. Loan Program Customization:
- FHA Loans: UFMIP (1.75%), MIP based on LTV and down payment.
- VA Loans: Funding fees based on down payment; exemptions for eligible borrowers.
- USDA Loans: Upfront and annual guarantee fees.
- Conventional Loans: User-defined PMI rates, with auto-termination at 78% LTV.
- Jumbo Loans: No MI but accommodate higher loan limits.

3. Key Functionalities:
- Monthly payment breakdown with charts and visuals.
- Closing costs estimator.
- Amortization schedules with early payoff options.
- Future refinance scenarios.
- Rent vs. own analysis.
- Side-by-side comparison of 3 scenarios.

4. Branding:
- Include Cohen Mortgage logos, colors, and fonts.
- Professional header and footer with contact info and disclaimers.
- Consistent visual style across outputs.

5. Protection and Security:
- Lock all formulas, calculations, and branding elements.
- Password-protect the sheet to restrict editing to user input fields.
- Include a disclaimer asserting proprietary ownership.

Proof of Concept Requirement:
To ensure alignment with our expectations for the consumer-facing portion of the tool, we request a mockup or proof-of-concept report. This will help us evaluate the visual appeal and layout before committing to the full project.

1. Visual Appeal:
- Clean, professional layout incorporating Cohen Mortgage branding.
- Charts, graphs, or tables summarizing key loan information.
- Space for payment breakdowns, closing costs, and scenario comparisons.

2. Key Elements to Include in the Mockup:
- A breakdown of monthly payments (PITIA) in a clear format.
- Estimated amounts due at closing, including down payment and program fees.
- Comparison of scenarios (e.g., loan options with different terms or rates).
- Optional elements: amortization summaries, rent vs. own analysis, refinance benefits.

3. Format:
- Provide the mockup as a PDF, screenshot, or Excel file demonstrating only the consumer-facing report portion.
- The mockup does not need to be functional at this stage.

4. Evaluation Criteria:
- Alignment with Cohen Mortgage branding. (See Instagram page @cohenmortgage & visit website www.cohenmortgage.com; logo and branding guidelines attached)
- Clarity and professionalism of the layout.
- Ability to present complex information in a simple, easy-to-understand format.
title: Mortgage Sales Tool - Dynamic Excel Sheet

description:
I'm looking for someone to capture data from tables on moneycontrol.com website.

In the "Pending Stock List 17Jan2025" excelsheet, I have listed down all the URLs from which data must be captured. The data must be captured in format as given in "Stock Data Format" excelsheet.

Bonus if you deliver the script also that fetches the data.

STEPS FOR UPDATING THE DATA:
Go to one of the URL in the excelsheet: Pending Stock List 17Jan2025.xlsx
Lets say, the URL is https://www.moneycontrol.com/financials/naharpolyfilms/consolidated-balance-sheetVI/NIH#NIH
and the corresponding stock id is 918

Now on this URL, you will see data for 5 years
Similarly, for other URLs on the same stock id, you will see data for 5 years

You will create 1 row in the excelsheet Stock Data Format.xlsx for each year for stock id 918
So there will be 5 entries:

description:
I want a website designed for Newrad which is an organisation formed to encourage people to find their authentic selves and to support them to remain that way.

Society has decided for us what is acceptable to wear. What is acceptable to say. Who is acceptable to love. Where is acceptable to go. They have even decided how it is acceptable to feel.

Above all we need to be our authentic selves to be happy. This may mean we want to wear different looking clothes, speak in different ways, laugh at different things. But who are we to judge?

Society is shaped through a media that is carefully controlled. Good or bad, there is room to allow people their rights to expression and certainly not lock them away in mental institutions for being 'different'. I think we are looking at the biggest failing in society today. Differences start wars, differences maintained keep people starving and without clean water. 

It is the art of observing without analysing that when learnt as common nature will set our world free to comment.
title: Empowering Website Design for Newrad

description:
PLEASE READ ALL THE TEXT! 
Build (or find) Webos 6.4 (LG TV rooted) tools to tune selected channel with parameters (freq, modulation, symbol_rate, etc) using /dev/dvb/adapter0/frontend0/ device 
Most possibly needs ioctl codes to send and cross compilation involved.
LINUX developer knowledge is a must!
BE SURE YOU ARE ABLE/KNOW HOW  cross compile C/C++ open source utils (target will be WebOS arm64)
For example pre-built static linked ffmpeg works (available precompiled bin for w_scan++ doesn't most possibly because of dependencies; ldd/objdump is unavailable in OS) 
No standard gcc package present in WebOS (old gcc opkg is available on sites but not tested)
Python is available.

OR gstreamer(140+ plugins) can be used for debug 
like gst-launch-1.0, gst-inspect-1.0. etc. FFmpeg binary available, Qt package available, libdvbv5 available. 

No dvbsrc, dvbv5-scan, w_scan_.. an no other utils available. So we need to cross compile it targeting arm64 and device libs (amv64 linux binary can be used, but dependencies could be a problem) . 

If you have access to Webos 3.6+ LG TV to test (obtaining root is a 2 min process, descr supplied) is a great advantage.

p.s.
NO GPT generated texts and source codes will help! I have GPT &  many bidders(GPT advanced users) already failed!
TASK NEEDS REAL RESEARCH & TESTS
title: Cross Compiling w_scan(or dvbv5-scan) and dvbsrc with LibDVB5/sys-libs (taken from device) for ARM64

I'm in need of an affordable, skilled web developer to build my e-commerce website. Key features should include:

- Product Listings: The site should be able to showcase a variety of products. Experience in designing attractive, user-friendly product pages will be beneficial.
  
- Payment Gateway Integration: A secure and efficient payment system is crucial. Familiarity with various payment gateways and their integration processes will be highly valued.

While I haven't specified a particular platform for this project, experience with popular e-commerce platforms such as Shopify, WooCommerce, or Magento will be a plus. The ideal candidate should be able to work within a budget while delivering quality work. Please provide examples of previous e-commerce sites you've developed, along with your proposal.
title: Budget-friendly E-commerce Website Development

description:
We are two young entrepreneurs from Austria, and we want to implement the following:

In Austria, you have to pass a theoretical exam to obtain a driving license.
However, the theoretical exam is very extensive and consists of around 1,500 questions.
Many students don’t know how to study effectively for the theoretical exam, and they lack a concept that can help them.

We have developed a learning concept that guarantees success for the students.

Our Plan:
We want to integrate these questions into our website.

Our website is currently being developed by a colleague using WordPress.

What we want to offer our students:

Login and access to the questions:

Students should be able to log in to our website with individual login credentials – whether on a PC, laptop, tablet, or mobile phone.
Each student will receive unique login credentials.
Once logged in, all questions should be visible and accessible on the website.
Track learning progress:

Students should have the ability to track their learning progress.
They should see which questions they have already learned and which ones they still need to review.
Admin functions:

We, as admins, also want to have the ability to view the learning progress of the students.
This will allow us to provide targeted support if necessary.
title: Driving Test Preparation Platform Development

description:
Nukkad Natak Script
Topic: Social Media ke Side Effects
(Cast: 5-6 students, each with different roles like narrator, influencers, addicted person, concerned friend, etc.)


---

(Background: Group of friends sitting at a café, glued to their phones.)

Narrator:
"Dilli waalo, suno suno! Aaj kal ki duniya ka sabse bada addiction – Social Media. Yehi topic hai humari aaj ki chhoti si presentation ka. Chaliye, shuru karte hain!"


---

(Scene 1: Addicted Friend)

Addicted Friend (Raj):
(scrolling on phone) "Bhai, meri post pe sirf 50 likes aaye... Duniya khatam ho gayi yaar!"

Concerned Friend (Simran):
"Arey Raj, tu toh kuch zyada hi serious ho gaya hai! Din bhar phone mein ghusa rehta hai. Real life ka kya?"

Raj:
"Real life? Arre Simran, real life ab bas Instagram stories aur reels tak limited hai."

Simran:
"Arre gadhe, woh virtual duniya hai. Padhai likhai, dost, family... Inka kya?"

Raj:
"Tu nahi samjhegi, Simran. Mujhe viral banna hai!"


---

(Scene 2: Fake Influencer)

Fake Influencer (Priya):
(dressed up in flashy clothes) "Hey guys! Main hoon Priya, aapki favorite influencer! Aaj mai aapko bataungi kaise ek cheap moisturizer ko luxury product banate hain."

Raj:
(awed) "Priya didi! Aap toh meri inspiration ho!"

Simran:
"Priya, tumhe pata hai na log tumhare fake reviews dekhke paise barbaad karte hain?"

Priya:
"Toh kya? Paisa toh aa raha hai na!"


---

(Scene 3: Troll Culture)

Troll (Aman):
(typing furiously on his phone) "Arey, ek aur celebrity ki post pe gaali deni hai. Mazza aata hai bhai!"

Simran:
"Arre Aman, ye trolling kyu? Kisi ki izzat ka kya?"

Aman:
"Izzat? Internet pe toh sab allowed hai, yaar!"

Simran:
"Allowed hai, par sahi nahi hai. Thoda toh soch, kisi ki life khatam ho sakti hai tere words ki wajah se."


---

(Scene 4: The Reality Check)

Narrator:
"Ab dosto, socho. Yeh humari asli duniya hai? Kya hum apne aas paas ke logon se zyada ek screen ke liye jee rahe hain?"

Simran:
"Raj, Priya, Aman... Social media ek tool hai, lekin agar hum uske gulaam ban gaye, toh asli duniya ka maza kaise lenge?"

Priya:
"Shayad tum sahi keh rahi ho, Simran. Mujhe apne actions ke consequences sochne chahiye."

Raj:
"Haan yaar, mai toh apne dost aur family ko neglect kar raha hoon."

Aman:
"Galti ho gayi yaar, ab se trolling band."


---

(Ending Song or Slogan)

(All together, clapping in rhythm)

Sab:
"Social media ka karlo use,
Par uska mat bano abuse!
Zyada scroll karoge toh ho jaoge bore,
Real life ka maza hai sabse zyada sure!"

Narrator:
"Toh dosto, samajhdari se social media ka use karo. Duniya bahut khoobsurat hai, bas screen ke uss paar dekho!"

(Everyone bows, thanking the audience.)


---

End of Natak
title: Social media ke side effects

description:
I'm looking for a skilled Android developer to create a utility/tool app focused on text-based content sharing. The app will primarily facilitate user-generated text posts.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop an intuitive, user-friendly interface for an Android app
- Implement a robust system for user authentication
- Integrate features for content sharing, specifically text-based posts

Ideal Skills and Experience:
- Proficient in Android app development
- Prior experience in creating utility or social media apps
- Strong understanding of user authentication systems
- Expertise in designing interactive content sharing features

Please provide examples of previous Android projects you've worked on, especially if they involved content sharing.
title: Android Developer Needed for Creating App
